name: Space Displacer
description:
This is my graded unit game for my second year of my HND at fife college.

At the beginning of the year i was given a brief  on which i was told my game had to have some aspect of time travel. My mind instantly went to the future and before long i had my idea. My game is a top down 2D survival game in space. For the time travelling mechanic i came up with a machine that could stop time. I called that machine the Space Displacer and the tile of the game was born.
